hero.title:
Build, Deploy & Share
AI Agents Visually
hero.description: Create powerful AI agents with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Connect multiple models, build custom tools, and deploy anywhere.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to build production-ready AI agents

visualBuilder.title: Visual Workflow Builder
visualBuilder.description: Drag and drop nodes to create complex AI workflows. Add conditions, loops, and logic.

multiModel.title: Multi-Model Support
multiModel.description: Connect to any AI model - OpenAI, Gemini, local models, or custom endpoints.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Export
multiLanguage.description: Export your agents to Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and more.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Trigger your agents via REST API. Perfect for integration with your apps.

shareCollaborate.title: Share & Collaborate
shareCollaborate.description: Publish agents publicly or keep them private. Collaborate with your team.

containerSupport.title: Container Support
containerSupport.description: Run models in Docker containers for isolation and scalability.

nodeLibrary.title: Rich Node Library
nodeLibrary.description: 20+ node types to build any workflow you can imagine

export.title: Export Anywhere
export.description: Build once, deploy anywhere. Export your agents to your preferred programming language.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your First Agent?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers building AI agents with our platform.

footer.description: Build, deploy, and share AI agents visually.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your preferences and customize your experience

theme.title: Theme & Appearance
theme.description: Customize the look and feel of your interface. Switch between light and dark theme to personalize your experience.

mode.title: Theme Mode
mode.description: Customize how the application looks on your device. Choose between light or dark theme.

language.title: Language & Region
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface. This will change the text and content language throughout the app.

appLanguage.title: Application Language
appLanguage.description: Select your preferred language for menus, buttons, and interface text.

sidebar.title: Sidebar Configuration
sidebar.description: Configure sidebar layout and behavior to optimize your workspace navigation and organization.

position.title: Position
position.description: Choose where the sidebar appears on the screen

style.title: Style
style.description: Select the visual style of your sidebar

view.title: View Mode
view.description: Select your preferred data display layout. Switch between grid and list views to customize how content appears.

layout.title: Display Layout
layout.description: Choose how your data is displayed in the interface

colors.title: Color Scheme
colors.description: Personalize the accent colors throughout the interface. Choose from various color palettes to match your preference.
